```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
#read_csv()

```
# Page 1

## Row 1

```{r}
p1 <- ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = mass, y = height, text = name)) +
  geom_point()

ggplotly(p1)
```

## Row 2 {.tabset}


```{r}
#| title: bar Chart

p2 <- ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = mass, y = height)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = .5, hjust = 1))

ggplotly(p2)
```

```{r}
#| title: Table

starwars <- starwars %>%
  select(name, height, mass, gender, homeworld, species)

knitr::kable(starwars)
```
